content:
If you've forgotten your email password, the first step is to utilize your email provider's password recovery options. Typically, this involves going to gmail.com, yahoo.com, OR whatever your provider is, then clicking "Forgot Password" on the login page. After that, you are just following the prompts to verify your identity.

Once that is done, you can re-enter it into thunderbird. You Can go to Settings -> Privacy and Security, Saved Passwords to remove the old one and add the new one.
creator: Thundamike

content: You saw the customer name because you blind-copied yourself on the message to that person, Those on the BCC list will see the message as it was sent to the original recipient. You could send BCC to recipients and in the TO, just leave it blank. Thunderbird will display 'unknown recipients'. You can confirm this by sending a BCC messages to yourself and omit the TO field.
creator: davidsk

content: Please clarify your objective, as Thunderbird does not store passwords for accessing browsers.

content:
L'account è impostato per usare la posta in solo testo. Nelle Opzioni account devi attivare Componi i messaggi in HTML -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/configurazione-opzioni-account#w_il-pannello-composizione-e-indirizzi

In alternativa tieni premuto il tasto delle Maiuscole mentre fai click su Nuovo messaggi o su Rispondi.
